interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Logan
Review Date: 2017/05/30
Store: Hugh Jackman  (Actor),     Patrick Stewart  (Actor),     James Mangold  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ["It's the year 2029, and much of the world's mutant population has succumbed to a genocidal, man-made virus. As a down-and-out Logan (Hugh Jackman, in his final appearance as the character) comes to terms with his failing healing factor, he and an ailing Charles Xavier (Patrick Stewart) must protect Laura (Dafne Keen)-a young genetically bred mutant with powers similar to Logan's-from the evil organization that created her. With Richard E. Grant, Boyd Holbrook, Stephen Merchant."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure/Superheroes', 'Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, James Mangold', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Surround)', 'Runtime': '137 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Director': 'James Mangold', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '137 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 23, 2017', 'Actors': 'Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Number of discs': '3'}
Review Text: It would have been helpful if they would have indicated it was in the future at the beginning of the film.
Review Title: Great

profile:
**User Summary:**

This user demonstrates a strong preference for action and adventure films, particularly within the superhero genre. Recent interactions indicate an appreciation for high-quality visual formats, as evidenced by the choice of Blu-ray. They display a keen interest in films featuring established actors and directors, suggesting a tendency to gravitate towards well-known talent and acclaimed cinematic teams.

With a focus on emotions and character development, the user values narratives with complexity, particularly those exploring themes of struggle and legacy. The mention of the film's timeline indicates a preference for clear contextual prompts within storytelling to enhance comprehension.

Overall, the user appears to prioritize engaging, character-driven plots, combined with quality production standards, while expressing a desire for clarity in the viewing experience. User ratings are generally high, indicating satisfaction with their choices in content.
